metadata.name: Suspicious Script Execution From Temp Folder
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious script executions from temporary folder

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\mshta.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cscript.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\temp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temporary internet')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\temp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%temp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%tmp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%localappdata%\\temp'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' >')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('out-file')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('convertto-json')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-windowstyle hidden -verb runas')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\system32\\config\\systemprofile\\appdata\\local\\temp\\amazon\\ec2-windows\\'))))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious script executions from temporary folder
